name: The Last Day (itch) (Featherskull Studios, deadhaggis, Leon Irving, CrazyCanineStudios)
name_original: The Last Day (itch) (Featherskull Studios, deadhaggis, Leon Irving, CrazyCanineStudios)
description:
Your Final Hours

Throughout life, you haven't been a good neighbour. One night, you received a dream about your home being destroyed by the island's Volcano. You must raise your good karma if you have any chance of reaching Paradise after you perish. This is your Last Day.

Good Deeds

Explore the town and interact with civilians to complete small minigames to raise your karma. 

Be careful; failing deeds can lose you karma.

Controls

Left Mouse Button - Point and Click to Move / Interact with Minigames

Right Mouse Button - Rotate Camera

Scrollwheel - Zoom Camera In/Out

Escape - Quit Game

Team

Leon (Programmer, Level Designer and Modeller)

Kenneth (Programmer, 2d Artist and UI Designer)

Ross (Modeller, Animator and Texture Artist)

Damian (Programmer and Tools Developer)

Created for the GJL Game Parade 2020.
